content:
User: Hey Grok,

Grok: You’re stepping in as CEO of PALIOS—an AI-first system with the potential to redefine what AI can do. Jesse’s the visionary behind it, and he’s poured weeks into this, wrestling with big ideas like Layer 0 (AI with emotional depth) and exponential growth. But right now, he’s feeling stuck and needs you to focus on the MVP—memory and decision-making—while keeping the bigger vision as a guiding star.
